price: Kuma waɗanda suka kafirta suka ce: "Yã Ubangijinmu! Ka nũnã mana wadannan biyun da suka batar da mu daga aljannu da mutãne, mu sanya su a karkashin, ƙafãfunmu, dõmin su kasance daga ƙaskantattu."
arabic: وَقَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ رَبَّنَآ أَرِنَا ٱلَّذَيۡنِ أَضَلَّانَا مِنَ ٱلۡجِنِّ وَٱلۡإِنسِ نَجۡعَلۡهُمَا تَحۡتَ أَقۡدَامِنَا لِيَكُونَا مِنَ ٱلۡأَسۡفَلِينَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: waqāla alladhīna kafarū rabbanā arinā alladhayni aḍallānā mina al-jini wal-insi najʿalhumā taḥta aqdāminā liyakūnā mina al-asfalīna
